00254     /**
00255      * 
00256      */
00257     public function __construct()
00258     {
00259         
00260         if( !self::$_hasStatic ) {
00261             
00262             self::_setStaticVars();
00263         }
00264         
00265         $this->_moduleClass   = get_class( $this );
00266         $this->_reflection    = new ReflectionObject( $this );
00267         $this->_moduleName    = $GLOBALS[ 'MCONF' ][ 'name' ];
00268         $this->_moduleNumber  = substr( $this->_moduleName, -1 );
00269         $this->_moduleSection = substr( $this->_moduleName, 0, strpos( $this->_moduleName, '_' ) );
00270         
00271         $this->_backPath = $GLOBALS[ 'BACK_PATH' ];
00272         
00273         $this->_modVars = t3lib_div::_GP( $this->_moduleName );
00274         
00275         foreach( $this->include_once as $includeFile ) {
00276             
00277             require_once( $includeFile );
00278         }
00279         
00280         $extPathInfo = explode( DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, $this->_reflection->getFileName() );
00281         
00282         array_pop( $extPathInfo );
00283         array_pop( $extPathInfo );
00284         
00285         $this->_extKey             = array_pop( $extPathInfo );
00286         
00287         $this->_extPath            = t3lib_extMgm::extPath( $this->_extKey );
00288         
00289         $this->_extRelativePath    = t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath( $this->_extKey );
00290         
00291         $this->_modulePath         = $this->_extPath . 'mod' . $this->_moduleNumber;
00292         
00293         $this->_moduleRelativePath = $this->_extRelativePath . 'mod1/';
00294         
00295         $this->_uploadDirectory    = str_replace(
00296             PATH_site,
00297             '',
00298             t3lib_div::getFileAbsFileName( 'uploads/tx_' . str_replace( '_', '', $this->_extKey ) . '/' )
00299         );
00300         
00301         $this->_lang               = tx_oop_Lang_Getter::getInstance( 'EXT:' . $this->_extKey . '/lang/mod' . $this->_moduleNumber . '.xml' );
00302         
00303         $this->_content            = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'div' );
00304     }
00305     
00306     /**
00307      * 
00308      */
00309     public function __toString()
00310     {
00311         $content                = '';
00312         $markers                = array();
00313         $markers[ 'CONTENT' ]   = ( string )$this->_content;
00314         $markers[ 'FUNC_MENU' ] = t3lib_BEfunc::getFuncMenu(
00315             $this->id,
00316             'SET[function]',
00317             $this->MOD_SETTINGS[ 'function' ],
00318             $this->MOD_MENU[ 'function' ]
00319         );
00320         
00321         $content                = $this->doc->startPage( $this->_lang->title )
00322                                 . $this->doc->moduleBody( $this->_pageInfos, $this->_buttons, $markers )
00323                                 . $this->doc->endPage();
00324         
00325         return $this->doc->insertStylesAndJS( $content );
00326     }

00328     /**
00329      * 
00330      */
00331     private static function _setStaticVars()
00332     {
00333         self::$_db        =  tx_oop_Database_Layer::getInstance();
00334         self::$_t3Db      =  $GLOBALS[ 'TYPO3_DB' ];
00335         self::$_t3Lang    =  $GLOBALS[ 'LANG' ];
00336         self::$_beUser    =  $GLOBALS[ 'BE_USER' ];
00337         self::$_tcaDescr  =& $GLOBALS[ 'TCA_DESCR' ];
00338         self::$_tca       =& $GLOBALS[ 'TCA' ];
00339         self::$client     =& $GLOBALS[ 'CLIENT' ];
00340         self::$_t3Conf    =& $GLOBALS[ 'TYPO3_CONF_VARS' ];
00341         self::$_NL        =  chr( 10 );
00342         self::$_TAB       =  chr( 9 );
00343         self::$_hasStatic =  true;
00344     }

00346     /**
00347      * 
00348      */
00349     private function _addJs( $path )
00350     {
00351         $js                 = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'script' );
00352         $js[ 'type' ]       = 'text/javascript';
00353         $js[ 'charset' ]    = 'utf-8';
00354         $js[ 'src' ]        = $this->_backPath . $this->_extRelativePath . $path;
00355         
00356         $this->doc->JScode .= self::$_NL . $js;
00357     }
00358     
00359     /**
00360      * Creates a thumbnail
00361      * 
00362      * @param   string  $file       The file path (relative to the upload directory)
00363      * @param   int     $width      The thumbnail maximum width
00364      * @param   int     $height     The thumbnail maximum height
00365      * @return  tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag    The thumbnail picture
00366      */
00367     protected function _createThumbnail( $file, $width = 100, $height = 100 )
00368     {
00369         // Gets the file absolute path
00370         $fileAbsPath  = PATH_site . $this->_uploadDirectory . $file;
00371         
00372         // Security check
00373         $fileCheck    = basename( $fileAbsPath)
00374                       . ':'
00375                       . filemtime( $fileAbsPath )
00376                       . ':'
00377                       . self::$_typo3ConfVars[ 'SYS' ][ 'encryptionKey' ];
00378         
00379         
00380         // URL that will generate the thumbnail
00381         $url          = self::$_backPath
00382                       . 'thumbs.php?size='
00383                       . $width
00384                       . 'x'
00385                       . $height
00386                       . '&file='
00387                       . rawurlencode( '../' . self::$_uploadDirectory . $file )
00388                       . '&md5sum='
00389                       . t3lib_div::shortMD5( $fileCheck );
00390         
00391         // Creates the image tag
00392         $img          = tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'img' );
00393         $img[ 'src' ] = htmlspecialchars( $url );
00394         $img[ 'alt' ] = $file;
00395         
00396         // Returns the thumbnail
00397         return $img;
00398     }
00399     
00400     /**
00401      * Creates a link with module variables
00402      * 
00403      * @param   string  $text           The link text
00404      * @param   array   $params         The module variables to set, as key/value pairs
00405      * @param   array   $keepModVars    The module variables to keep
00406      * @return  tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag        The link
00407      */
00408     protected function _link( $text, array $params = array(), $keepModVars = false )
00409     {
00410         // Base url
00411         $url = ( $keepModVars ) ? t3lib_div::linkThisScript( array( $this->_moduleName => $this->_modVars ) ) : t3lib_div::linkThisScript();
00412         
00413         // Process each parameter
00414         foreach( $params as $key => $value ) {
00415             
00416             // Adds the current parameter
00417             $url .= '&' . $this->_moduleName . '[' . $key . ']=' . $value;
00418         }
00419         
00420         // Creates the full link
00421         $link              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'a' );
00422         $link[ 'href' ]    = $url;
00423         
00424         // Adds the linked text
00425         $link->addTextData( $text );
00426         
00427         // Returns the link
00428         return $link;
00429     }
00430     
00431     /**
00432      * Creates a link to a function of the menu
00433      * 
00434      * @param   string  $text       The link text
00435      * @param   int     $function   The menu function ID
00436      * @return  tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag    The link
00437      */
00438     protected function _functionLink( $text, $function )
00439     {
00440         // Creates the URL
00441         $url = t3lib_div::linkThisScript(
00442             array(
00443                 'SET' => array(
00444                     'function' => $function
00445                 )
00446             )
00447         );
00448         
00449         // Creates the full link
00450         $link              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'a' );
00451         $link[ 'href' ]    = $url;
00452         
00453         // Adds the linked text
00454         $link->addTextData( $text );
00455         
00456         // Returns the link
00457         return $link;
00458     }

00460     /**
00461      * Creates a link to the edit view of a record
00462      * 
00463      * @param   string  $table      The table name
00464      * @param   int     $uid        The ID of the record
00465      * @param   string  $text       The link text
00466      * @return  tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag    The link
00467      */
00468     protected function _editLink( $table, $uid, $text )
00469     {
00470         // On click action
00471         $onClick = t3lib_BEfunc::editOnClick(
00472             '&edit[' . $table . '][' . $uid . ']=edit',
00473             $this->_backPath
00474         );
00475         
00476         // Creates the full link
00477         $link              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'a' );
00478         $link[ 'href' ]    = '#';
00479         $link[ 'onclick' ] = htmlspecialchars( $onClick );
00480         
00481         // Adds the linked text
00482         $link->addTextData( $text );
00483         
00484         // Returns the link
00485         return $link;
00486     }
00487     
00488     /**
00489      * Gets an icon from the extension
00490      * 
00491      * @param   string  $name       The icon name
00492      * @param   array               The align parameter of the IMG tag
00493      * @return  tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag    The image tag
00494      */
00495     protected function _skinImg( $name, $align = 'bottom' )
00496     {
00497         // Gets the file absolute path
00498         $fileAbsPath = $this->_extPath
00499                      . 'res/img/'
00500                      . $name;
00501         
00502         // Checks if the requested file exists
00503         if( file_exists( $fileAbsPath ) && is_readable( $fileAbsPath ) ) {
00504             
00505             // Gets the image size
00506             $size   = getimagesize( $fileAbsPath );
00507             
00508             // Creates the image tag
00509             $img             = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'img' );
00510             $img[ 'src' ]    = $this->_backPath . $this->_extRelativePath . 'res/img/' . $name;
00511             $img[ 'width' ]  = $size[ 0 ];
00512             $img[ 'height' ] = $size[ 1 ];
00513             $img[ 'alt' ]    = $name;
00514             $img[ 'hspace' ] = '0';
00515             $img[ 'vspace' ] = '0';
00516             $img[ 'border' ] = '0';
00517             $img[ 'align' ]  = $align;
00518             
00519             // Returns the image tag
00520             return $img;
00521         }
00522         
00523         // File not found
00524         return '';
00525     }
00526     
00527     /**
00528      * Gets an icon from TYPO3
00529      * 
00530      * @param   string  $name       The icon name
00531      * @param   array               The align parameter of the IMG tag
00532      * @return  tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag    The image tag
00533      */
00534     protected function _t3SkinImg( $name, $align = 'bottom' )
00535     {
00536         // Gets the image source
00537         $imgSrc = t3lib_iconWorks::skinImg( $this->_backPath, $name, '', 1 );
00538         
00539         // Gets the file absolute path
00540         $fileAbsPath = $GLOBALS[ 'TBE_STYLES' ][ 'skinImgAutoCfg' ][ 'absDir' ] . $name;
00541         
00542         // Checks if the requested file exists
00543         if( file_exists( $fileAbsPath ) && is_readable( $fileAbsPath ) ) {
00544             
00545             // Gets the image size
00546             $size   = getimagesize( $fileAbsPath );
00547             
00548             // Creates the image tag
00549             $img             = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'img' );
00550             $img[ 'src' ]    = $imgSrc;
00551             $img[ 'width' ]  = $size[ 0 ];
00552             $img[ 'height' ] = $size[ 1 ];
00553             $img[ 'alt' ]    = $name;
00554             $img[ 'hspace' ] = '0';
00555             $img[ 'vspace' ] = '0';
00556             $img[ 'border' ] = '0';
00557             $img[ 'align' ]  = $align;
00558             
00559             // Returns the image tag
00560             return $img;
00561         }
00562         
00563         // File not found
00564         return '';
00565     }
00566     
00567     /**
00568      * 
00569      */
00570     protected function _addButton( $name, $file, $fromSkin = true )
00571     {
00572         // Creates the button image
00573         $img = ( $fromSkin ) ? $this->_t3SkinImg( $file ) : $this->_skinImg( $file );
00574         
00575         // URL
00576         $url = t3lib_div::linkThisScript( array( $this->_moduleName => array( 'actions' => array( $name => true ) ) ) );
00577         
00578         // Creates the full link
00579         $link              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'a' );
00580         $link[ 'href' ]    = $url;
00581         
00582         // Adds the button image
00583         $link->addTextData( $img );
00584         
00585         // Adds the button
00586         $this->_buttons[ $name ] = $link;
00587     }
00588     
00589     /**
00590      * Gets the CSM menu for a record
00591      * 
00592      * This method creates an icon of the requested record with a
00593      * Context Sensitive Menu (CSM).
00594      * 
00595      * @param   string              The table of the record
00596      * @param   array               The record's row
00597      * @param   array               The align parameter of the IMG tag
00598      * @return  tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag    The icon with a CSM menu link
00599      */
00600     protected function _recordIcon( $table, $row, $align = 'bottom' )
00601     {
00602         // Ensures the record's row is an array (may be an stdClass object)
00603         $row = ( array )$row;
00604         
00605         // Gets the record icon
00606         $icon = t3lib_iconWorks::getIconImage(
00607             $table,
00608             $row,
00609             $this->_backPath,
00610             'align="' . $bottom . '"'
00611         );
00612         
00613         // On click action
00614         $onClick = $this->doc->wrapClickMenuOnIcon(
00615             $icon,
00616             $table,
00617             $row[ 'uid' ],
00618             1,
00619             '',
00620             '',
00621             true
00622         );
00623 
00624         // Creates the link
00625         $link              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'a' );
00626         $link[ 'onclick' ] = htmlspecialchars( $onClick );
00627         
00628         // Checks if we have to add the context menu event
00629         if( isset( $GLOBALS[ 'TYPO3_CONF_VARS' ][ 'BE' ][ 'useOnContextMenuHandler' ] )
00630             && $GLOBALS[ 'TYPO3_CONF_VARS' ][ 'BE' ][ 'useOnContextMenuHandler' ]
00631         ) {
00632             
00633             // Adds the context menu event
00634             $link[ 'oncontextmenu' ] = htmlspecialchars( $onClick );
00635         }
00636         
00637         // Adds the icon to the link
00638         $link->addTextData( $icon );
00639         
00640         // Returns the link
00641         return $link;
00642     }
00643     
00644     protected function _editIcon( $table, $id, $align = 'bottom' )
00645     {
00646         $icon              = $this->_t3SkinImg( 'gfx/edit2.gif', $align );
00647         $link              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'a' );
00648         $link[ 'href' ]    = '#';
00649         $link[ 'onclick' ] = htmlspecialchars(
00650             t3lib_BEfunc::editOnClick(
00651                 '&edit[' . $table . '][' . $id . ']=edit',
00652                 $this->_backPath
00653             )
00654         );
00655         
00656         $link->addTextData( $icon );
00657         
00658         return $link;
00659     }
00660     
00661     protected function _infoIcon( $table, $id, $align = 'bottom' )
00662     {
00663         $icon              = $this->_t3SkinImg( 'gfx/zoom2.gif', $align );
00664         $link              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'a' );
00665         $link[ 'href' ]    = '#';
00666         $link[ 'onclick' ] = 'top.launchView( \''
00667                            .  $table
00668                            .  '\', \''
00669                            .  $id
00670                            .  '\' ); return false;';
00671         
00672         $link->addTextData( $icon );
00673         
00674         return $link;
00675     }
00676     
00677     protected function _deleteIcon( $table, $id, $confirmDialog = true, $align = 'bottom' )
00678     {
00679         $icon              = $this->_t3SkinImg( 'gfx/garbage.gif', $align );
00680         $link              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'a' );
00681         $link[ 'href' ]    = htmlspecialchars(
00682             $this->doc->issueCommand(
00683                 '&cmd[' . $table . ']['. $id .'][delete]=1'
00684             )
00685         );
00686         
00687         if( $confirmDialog ) {
00688             
00689             $link[ 'onclick' ] = htmlspecialchars(
00690                 'return confirm( \''
00691               . self::$_t3Lang->sL( 'LLL:EXT:lang/locallang_alt_doc.xml:deleteWarning' )
00692               . '\' );'
00693             );
00694         }
00695         
00696         $link->addTextData( $icon );
00697         
00698         return $link;
00699     }
00700     
00701     /**
00702      * Gets the label for a database field
00703      * 
00704      * @param   string  The table name
00705      * @param   string  The field name
00706      * @return  string  The label
00707      */
00708     protected function _getFieldLabel( $table, $field )
00709     {
00710         // Checks if the table exists in the TCA
00711         if( !isset( $GLOBALS[ 'TCA' ][ $table ] ) ) {
00712             
00713             // The table does not exist
00714             return '';
00715         }
00716         
00717         // Checks if the TCA is loaded
00718         if( !isset( $GLOBALS[ 'TCA' ][ $table ][ 'columns' ] ) ) {
00719             
00720             // Loads the TCA
00721             t3lib_div::loadTCA( $table );
00722         }
00723         
00724         // Checks if the field exists in the TCA
00725         if( !isset( $GLOBALS[ 'TCA' ][ $table ][ 'columns' ][ $field ] ) ) {
00726             
00727             // The field does not exist
00728             return '';
00729         }
00730         
00731         // Returns the label
00732         return self::$_t3Lang->sL( $GLOBALS[ 'TCA' ][ $table ][ 'columns' ][ $field ][ 'label' ] );
00733     }
00734     
00735     
00736     
00737     /**
00738      * Creates a select menu
00739      * 
00740      * @param   string              The name of the select
00741      * @param   string              The label for the select menu
00742      * @param   array               The items to place on the menu, as value/label pairs
00743      * @return  tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag    The select menu
00744      */
00745     protected function _createSelect( $name, $label, array $items )
00746     {
00747         // Creates the container DIV
00748         $container            = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'div' );
00749         $container[ 'style' ] = 'overflow: hidden; height: 100%;';
00750         
00751         // Creates the label and it's container DIV
00752         $labelDiv             = $container->div;
00753         $labelDiv[ 'style' ]  = 'float: left; width: 150px; font-weight: bold;';
00754         $label                = $labelDiv->label;
00755         $label[ 'for' ]       = $this->_moduleName . '-' . $name;
00756         
00757         // Creates the select and it's container DIV
00758         $selectDiv            = $container->div;
00759         $selectDiv[ 'style' ] = 'float: left;';
00760         $select               = $selectDiv->select;
00761         $select[ 'name' ]     = $this->_moduleName . '[' . $name . ']';
00762         $select[ 'id' ]       = $this->_moduleName . '-' . $name;
00763         
00764         // Process the items
00765         foreach( $items as $value => $label ) {
00766             
00767             // Creates the option tag
00768             $option            = $select->option;
00769             $option[ 'value' ] = $value;
00770             
00771             // Checks the module variables
00772             if( $this->_modVars[ $name ] == $value ) {
00773                 
00774                 // The current item is selected
00775                 $option[ 'selected' ] = 'selected';
00776             }
00777         }
00778         
00779         // Returns the full select
00780         return $container;
00781     }
00782

00784      * 
00785      */
00786     protected function _checkAction( $name )
00787     {
00788         return isset( $this->_modVars[ 'actions' ][ $name ] );
00789     }

00794     protected function _getActiveMenuItem()
00795     {
00796         return $this->MOD_SETTINGS[ 'function' ];
00797     }

00799     /**
00800      * Includes the jQuery JS framework
00801      * 
00802      * @return  NULL
00803      */
00804     protected function _includeJQuery()
00805     {
00806         // Only includes the script once
00807         if( self::$_hasJQuery === false ) {
00808             
00809             // Adds the JS script
00810             $this->_addJs( 'jquery/jquery.js' );
00811             
00812             // Script has been included
00813             self::$_hasJQuery = true;
00814         }
00815     }
00816

00829

00832         }
00833     }

00871     /**
00872      * Includes the Scriptaculous JS framework
00873      * 
00874      * @return  NULL
00875      * @see     _includePrototype
00876      */
00877     protected function _includeScriptaculous()
00878     {
00879         // Only includes the script once
00880         if( self::$_hasScriptaculous === false ) {
00881             
00882             // Includes the Prototype JS framework
00883             $this->_includePrototype();
00884             
00885             // Adds the JS script
00886             $this->_addJs( 'scriptaculous/scriptaculous.js' );
00887             
00888             // Script has been included
00889             self::$_hasScriptaculous = true;
00890         }
00891     }
00892     
00893     /**
00894      * Includes a Webtoolkit script
00895      * 
00896      * Available scripts are:
00897      * - base64
00898      * - crc32
00899      * - md5
00900      * - sha1
00901      * - sha256
00902      * - url
00903      * - utf8
00904      * 
00905      * @param   string  The name of the script to include
00906      * @return  NULL
00907      */
00908     protected function _includeWebtoolkitScript( $script )
00909     {
00910         // Only includes the script once
00911         if( !isset( self::$_webtoolkitLoadedScripts[ $script ] ) ) {
00912             
00913             // Adds the JS script
00914             $this->_addJs( 'webtoolkit/' . $script . '.js' );
00915             
00916             // Script has been included
00917             self::$_webtoolkitLoadedScripts[ $script ] = true;
00918         }
00919     }
00920     
00921     /**
00922      * Includes a jQuery plugin
00923      * 
00924      * Available plugins are:
00925      * - accordion
00926      * - dimensions
00927      * 
00928      * @param   string  The name of the plugin to include
00929      * @return  NULL
00930      */
00931     protected function _includeJQueryPlugin( $plugin )
00932     {
00933         // Only includes the script once
00934         if( !isset( self::$_jQueryLoadedPlugins[ $plugin ] ) ) {
00935             
00936             // Checks for dependancies
00937             if( isset( self::$_jQueryPluginsDeps[ $plugin ] ) ) {
00938                 
00939                 // Process each dependancy
00940                 foreach( self::$_jQueryPluginsDeps[ $plugin ] as $deps ) {
00941                     
00942                     // Includes the plugin
00943                     $this->_includeJQueryPlugin( $deps );
00944                 }
00945             }
00946             
00947             // Adds the JS script
00948             $this->_addJs( 'jquery/jquery' . $plugin . '.js' );
00949             
00950             // Script has been included
00951             self::$_jQueryLoadedPlugins[ $plugin ] = true;
00952         }
00953     }

00955     /**
00956      * 
00957      */
00958     public function menuConfig()
00959     {
00960         $this->MOD_MENU = array(
00961             'function' => array()
00962         );
00963         
00964         $this->_setMenuItems( $this->MOD_MENU[ 'function' ] );
00965         
00966         parent::menuConfig();
00967     }
00968     
00969     /**
00970      * 
00971      */
00972     public function createModulePage()
00973     {
00974         parent::init();
00975         
00976         $this->_pageInfos = t3lib_BEfunc::readPageAccess(
00977             $this->id,
00978             $this->perms_clause
00979         );
00980         
00981         $access = is_array( $this->_pageInfos ) ? true : false;
00982         
00983         $this->doc = t3lib_div::makeInstance( 'template' );
00984         
00985         $this->doc->setModuleTemplate( $this->_extPath . 'res/html/mod' . $this->_moduleNumber . '.html' );
00986         
00987         $this->doc->backPath = $this->_backPath;
00988         
00989         $this->_buttons[ 'csh' ] = t3lib_BEfunc::cshItem(
00990             '_MOD_' . $this->_moduleSection . '_func',
00991             '',
00992             $this->_backPath
00993         );
00994         
00995         $this->_addButton( 'save', 'gfx/savedok.gif' );
00996         
00997         if( self::$_beUser->mayMakeShortcut() ) {
00998             
00999             $this->_buttons[ 'shortcut' ] = $this->doc->makeShortcutIcon(
01000                 '',
01001                 'function',
01002                 $this->_moduleName
01003             );
01004         }
01005         
01006         // Checks wether the current BE user can access this module
01007         if( ( $this->id && $access )
01008             || ( self::$_beUser->user[ 'admin' ] && !$this->id )
01009         ) {
01010             
01011             $contextMenuParts = $this->doc->getContextMenuCode();
01012             
01013             $this->doc->bodyTagAdditions = $contextMenuParts[ 1 ];
01014             
01015             // Creates the module's form tag
01016             $form                  = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'form' );
01017             $form[ 'action' ]      = '';
01018             $form[ 'method' ]      = 'post';
01019             $form[ 'enctype' ]     = self::$_t3Conf[ 'SYS' ][ 'form_enctype' ];
01020             $form[ 'name' ]        = $this->_moduleName . '_form';
01021             $form[ 'id' ]          = $this->_moduleName . '_form';
01022             
01023             $this->doc->form       = ( string )$form;
01024             
01025             $jsCode                = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'script' );
01026             $jsCode[ 'type' ]      = 'text/javascript';
01027             $jsCode[ 'charset' ]   = 'utf-8';
01028             $jsCodeData            = '// <![CDATA['
01029                                    . self::$_NL
01030                                    . 'var script_ended = 0;'
01031                                    . self::$_NL
01032                                    . 'function jumpToUrl( URL ) {'
01033                                    . self::$_NL
01034                                    . '    document.location = URL;'
01035                                    . self::$_NL
01036                                    . '}'
01037                                    . self::$_NL
01038                                    . '// ]]>';
01039             
01040             $jsCode->addTextData( $jsCodeData );
01041             
01042             $this->doc->JScode     = ( string )$jsCode . self::$_NL . $contextMenuParts[ 0 ];
01043             
01044             $postCode              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'script' );
01045             $postCode[ 'type' ]    = 'text/javascript';
01046             $postCode[ 'charset' ] = 'utf-8';
01047             
01048             // Adds some JavaScript code
01049             $postCodeData          = '// <![CDATA['
01050                                    . self::$_NL
01051                                    . 'script_ended = 1;'
01052                                    . self::$_NL
01053                                    . 'if( top.fsMod ) {'
01054                                    . self::$_NL
01055                                    . '    top.fsMod.recentIds[ \'' . $this->_moduleSection . '\' ] = 0;'
01056                                    . self::$_NL
01057                                    . '}'
01058                                    . self::$_NL
01059                                    . '// ]]>';
01060             
01061             $postCode->addTextData( $jsCodeData );
01062             
01063             $this->doc->postCode   = ( string )$postCode . self::$_NL . $contextMenuParts[ 2 ];
01064             
01065             $this->_content->comment( 'Start of module content' );
01066             
01067             $this->_getModuleContent( $this->_content->div );
01068             
01069             $this->_content->comment( 'End of module content' );
01070         }
01071     }
